entries.title: Binance.US to Buy Assets of Bankrupt Crypto Lender Voyager, Eyes More Acquisitions
entries.description: CEO Brian Shroder says the U.S. arm of the cryptocurrency exchange has hundreds of millions of dollars to deploy

entries.title: Elon Musk's Twitter Poll Shows Users Want Him to Step Down
entries.description: The poll showed that 57.5% of respondents want him to leave as head of the social-media platform, bringing it fresh uncertainty.

entries.title: Epic Games, Maker of 'Fortnite,' to Pay $520 Million to Resolve FTC Allegations
entries.description: The agency alleged that the company invaded children’s privacy and tricked players of all ages into making unintended purchases.

entries.title: EU Charges Meta With Antitrust Violations Linked to Marketplace
entries.description: The European Union charged Facebook parent Meta with antitrust violations for allegedly distorting competition by tying its online classified ad service to its social network.
